title: empty_duck_house_on_site
summary: Empty duck house observed on site at MaMeeFarm.
description: This data unit documents the real on-site condition of an empty duck house at MaMeeFarm. The structure is currently unused, showing ground condition and bamboo construction without ducks present. This record serves as verifiable ground-truth evidence of farm infrastructure status at the time of capture.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
